term.title: flash point

item.text: The lowest temperature at which a substance, e.g. fuel oil, will give off a vapour that will flash or burn momentarily when ignited.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2188 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
